# selectedIndex

**Instance Property**

The current selection’s index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of the property must be within the bounds of the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPPointOfInterestTemplate/pointsOfInterest] array, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotFound-4qp9h] to indicate no selection.

## Managing the Points of Interest

- **pointsOfInterest**: The points of interest the template displays on the map and in the scrollable picker.
- **setPointsOfInterest(_:selectedIndex:)**: Updates the points of interest and the current selection.
